A socket is a concatenation of:
Which of the following object names follows the camel case naming convention?

question.choiceA: A mechanism of wrapping the data (variables) and code acting on the data (methods) together as a single unit.
question.choiceB: The ability of an object to take on many forms.
question.choiceC: The mechanism of basing an object or class upon another object or class, retaining similar implementation.
question.choiceD: The concept of "showing" only essential attributes and "hiding" unnecessary information.
